name: Programming for Engineers
body:
# Programming for Engineers  
## Featuring Excel Automation with VBA  
### An SPE YP Webinar Series
### Presented by [Derrick W. Turk](https://github.com/derrickturk) | [terminus data science, LLC](http://www.terminusdatascience.com)  

## Session 1: "Eat Your Vegetables"  
[Session 1 Slides](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/notes_day1.pptx?raw=true)  

Session 1 Finished Excel Workbooks:  
* [Hello VBA] (https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/hello_world.xlsm?raw=true)  
* [Funcs & Subs](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/funcs_and_subs.xlsm?raw=true)  
* [Pseudopressure](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day1/pseudopressure.xlsm?raw=true)  

Session 1 Code Examples: 
* [Hello VBA](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day1/HelloWorld.bas)  
* [Funcs & Subs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day1/FuncsAndSubs.bas)  
* [Pseudopressure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day1/PseudoPressureCalculation.bas)  

## Session 2: "Composite Materials"  
[Session 1 Slides](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day2/notes_day2.pptx?raw=true)  

Session 2 Finished Excel Workbooks:
* [Hyperbolic Decline](https://github.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/blob/master/day2/hyperbolic.xlsm?raw=true)  

Session 2 Code Examples:  
* [Hyperbolic Decline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day2/Hyperbolic.bas)  
* [Passing Modes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derrickturk/yp-excel-automation/master/day2/PassingModes.bas)  

## References  
* [MSDN: VBA Language Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/gg264383.aspx)  
* [MSDN: Excel Object Model Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/ee861528.aspx)
